On Friday, February 22, 2002, at 10:12  AM, Hoepner, Josh (J.M.) wrote:

> Hello all,
>
> I am fairly new to JUnit and I have come across a problem while writing
> test cases.  I am in a situation where I require one test case to have
> multiple assertions.  If one of these assertions fails, I still need the
> others to run.  I'm sure someone else has tried something like this in
> the past, does anyone have any suggestions?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Josh Hoepner
> Great Lakes Technologies Group
